section.name: Rubine 3D Algorithm
section.p: The Rubine 3D algorithm is based on the Rubine algorithm, which is executed on each plane.
section.subsection: The parameters are the same as for the Rubine algorithm except that they have to be specified for each plane.

subsection.name: Example Configuration
subsection.source: <configuration> <algorithm name="org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.rubine3d.Rubine3DAlgorithm"> <parameter name="XY_MIN_DISTANCE">2.0</parameter> <parameter name="YZ_MIN_DISTANCE">3.0</parameter> <parameter name="ZX_MIN_DISTANCE">1.0</parameter> <parameter name="XY_PROBABILITY">0.95</parameter> <parameter name="YZ_PROBABILITY">0.95</parameter> <parameter name="ZX_PROBABILITY">0.95</parameter> <parameter name="XY_MAHALANOBIS_DISTANCE">400.0</parameter> <parameter name="YZ_MAHALANOBIS_DISTANCE">800.0</parameter> <parameter name="ZX_MAHALANOBIS_DISTANCE">400.0</parameter> <parameter name="XY_WEIGHT">0.2</parameter> <parameter name="ZX_WEIGHT">0.2</parameter> <parameter name="YZ_WEIGHT">0.6</parameter> <parameter name="XY_FEATURE_LIST"> org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F1, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F2, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F3, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F4, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F5, </parameter> <parameter name="YZ_FEATURE_LIST"> org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F1, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F2, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F3, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F4, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F5 </parameter> <parameter name="ZX_FEATURE_LIST"> org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F1, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F2, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F3, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F4, org.ximtec.igesture.algorithm.feature.F5 </parameter> </algorithm> </configuration>
